data.name: Elasticsearch
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setHeader name="ES_NAME">
        <constant>{{instance_name}}</constant>
    </setHeader>
    {{#if (eq query_params.operation "Search")}}
        <convertBodyTo type="String"/>
    {{/if}}
    <toD uri="${header.ES_NAME}://elasticsearch{{querystring query_params extra_query_params}}"/>
    
    {{#if (eq query_params.operation "Search")}}
        <process ref="elasticSearchHitsToString"/>
    {{/if}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
